scripts.copy: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:misc && npm run copy:epubs
scripts.sw: cat node_modules/pako/dist/pako_inflate.js app/lib/jszip.js app/sw/file-decryptor.js app/lib/forge.aes.js app/sw/beer-service-worker.js > dist/beer-service-worker.js
scripts.sw:package: cat node_modules/pako/dist/pako_deflate.min.js > dist/beer-service-worker.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- app/lib/jszip.js >> dist/beer-service-worker.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- app/sw/file-decryptor.js >> dist/beer-service-worker.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- app/sw/beer-service-worker.js >> dist/beer-service-worker.js
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run js && npm run sw
scripts.dev: npm run build && parallelshell 'webpack --watch' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:sw'
scripts.package: npm run js -- -p && npm run sw:package
